message: Did anybody stop to think that he is a disgruntled worker cuz he got fired? This type of criminal activity coming from kids today is psychotic. Is it me or does it seem like there's a lot more of this going on today? I know we hear more stuff because of the growth of the media, but back in my day, the media was covering the Vietnam war and the reporters were embeded with the soldiers. The murder of John F. Kennedy was the big story when I was a kid. There were three main networks. We still heard news from around the world. I just think we're living in a critical point in time. Much more in the way of spiritual decline. We are losing the souls of our kids. This new generation of socialist progressive behavior is motivated by the gov. run schools employing these types of instructors or teachers.

Yes because the DNC can manufacture 4 million votes. (Sarcasm) Bernie never won the black vote. Minorities were not interested in Bernie Sanders. And if you say something stupid --that we didn't understand based on the media--so help me --I will find you. I understood who I was voting for and Sanders had no appeal.

I watched his last debate and I did not hear any plans to help Vets or anyone else. I have yet to hear him have an intelligent dialogue with anyone about what he plans to do for our country. I would not consider putting my life in his hands.
